channel.title: Surveys for Cash (Proof is Inside)
channel.description:
[b]Let me first mention, this offer is only available to people currently in the United States.[/b] Secondly, this isn't the bullshit sites that pay you at the end of the month, require a cashout price, or force other payment options on you. Lately I've been looking into the best survey and clicking organizations for maximum online profit for short periods of activity. I've been successful in finding an awesome site that has daily cashouts (Daily paying for accumulated profit via the site.) You can choose to cashout via increments of dollars (ex. $1.00, $2.00, $3.00) But the first day I accumulated around $1.50 in ten minutes. I cashed out and received it that day:
[IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/7369/tralk4.png[/img]
Give it a shot if you want, hell, what can you lose by accumulating a dollar and clicking cash out?
[center] [ul][*][size=13pt][b]Referred Signup[/b][/size] (To help me out in the long run) http://www.easymazuma.com/index.php?id=5234
[*][size=13pt][b]Regular Signup[/b][/size] (For you and yourself personally) http://www.easymazuma.com/[/ul] [/center]

item.title: Surveys for Cash (Proof is Inside)
item.dc:creator: @Crack_Miners Crack Miners
item.description:
@Crack_Miners wrote:

I do them in my free time, I really can’t be bothered doing some of them when they don’t transfer cookies correctly. But they are usually reliable. I have around $9.00 in my paypal from this, which isn’t bad seeing as I do them leisurely. But in no way do you have to sign up to be my referal, I absolutely hate being a referal, and don’t think other people should gain profit for just showing me a link I could have otherwise searched for.

Read full topic

$11.50 an hour for clickin’ ads? seems fun.
[/quote]You got that much? You could make a living of that. I tried this and I was to lasy to do one survey for 80 cents.[/quote]
no, he said he made that like in 7mins or something.

item.title: Surveys for Cash (Proof is Inside)
item.dc:creator: @Crack_Miners Crack Miners
item.description:
@Crack_Miners wrote:

[quote=“vraj82192, post:13, topic:180807”]Cool I’ll try it out.

(Lol your Indian :), Sangeeeta, Kush) Me too ;)[/quote]

Actually, the person sending me the money is the one of Indian heritage, not me. But I’ve gotten several more payments from here if you guys want more proof. I’ve made around seven dollars from these guys so far, my only gripe is that when I complete long ass surveys sometimes and they don’t send the cookie saying I’ve completed it, grinds my gears so bad. But they’ve been really good about payouts, sending me my money about an hour after requesting it.
